x-maec-avclass.title: AVClassification
x-maec-avclass.description: The x-maec-avclass extension captures information on anti-virus (AV) tool classifications for a particular file.

scan_date.description: Specifies the date and time of the scan. This field can be used to capture how a scan changes over time.

is_detected.description: Specifies whether or not the AV tool specified in AVClassificationType has detected the malware instance that is characterized by the Malware Instance.

classification_name.description: Captures the classification assigned to the malware instance object by the AV scanner tool.

av_name.description: Captures the name of the AV scanner tool.

av_vendor.description: Captures the vendor of the AV scanner tool.

av_version.description: Captures the version of the AV scanner tool.

av_engine_version.description: Captures the version of the AV engine used by the AV scanner tool.

av_definition_version.description: Captures the version of the AV definitions used by the AV scanner tool.
